metadata.title: USN-5843-1 -- tmux vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that tmux incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5843-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  tmux - 1.8-5ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
